Package com.persistentsystems.socketclient.listeners

Interface WrFirmwareListener

  • public interface WrFirmwareListener
    This interface must be implemented by any WrAsyncSocket wanting to receive notifications about the firmware update process. See WrAsyncSocket.setFirmwareListener(WrFirmwareListener).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onFirmwareError​(WrFirmwareResult xResult)
      An error was detected during the firmware process.
      void onFirmwareFinished​(WrFirmwareResult xResult)
      The firmware transfer has finished.
      void onFirmwareReady​(WrFirmwareResult xResult)
      The firmware transfer is ready to begin.

    • Method Detail

      • onFirmwareFinished

        void onFirmwareFinished​(WrFirmwareResult xResult)
        The firmware transfer has finished.
        Parameters:
        xResult - result

      • onFirmwareError

        void onFirmwareError​(WrFirmwareResult xResult)
        An error was detected during the firmware process.
        Parameters:
        xResult - result

      • onFirmwareReady

        void onFirmwareReady​(WrFirmwareResult xResult)
        The firmware transfer is ready to begin. This happens when the mpu5 is setup in the correct mode.
        Parameters:
        xResult - result
